column5: I know some provincial parks have HP restrictions on there lakes.  My question is are there any other lakes in Ontario that have a HP restriction.  If there is where can i find a list of them??  Thanks for any help.

I think that the MNR, would have all that info cause they would be the ones enforcing the rules about that,i would think that its in environmentaly sensitive areas,and most would be in algonquin prov. park,but i could be wrong,there might be lots way up north,maybe some other board members might know ???
Check out this site I think it's in there somewhere Ontario Waterways  jjcanoe
